t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Two different sellers, same Brand name, different brand
s: While optimizing a campaign I was given the option to add some products that aren’t mine. These products however were the same brand as the listings that I have created and have been selling on Amazon, so they were available for me to add to the campaign.

t: Why do some products on Amazon look the same but have different brand names? - Quora
s: Answer: This is simple to answer. They look similar because the different brands are using the same supplier. This is ok but I suspect they are taking a generic product (like skin cream or headphones) but are not doing any modifications beyond putting their brand name on the product and packaging...

t: Amazon Transparency: Counterfeit and brand protection
s: If you meet all eligibility requirements, enroll your brand in the Transparency program. Use the same credentials you use to log in to the Brand Registry portal. If your brand is already enrolled, log in to the Transparency portal to enroll products and add users to your account.

t: What is the difference between Amazon sellers name and brand name? Could they be the same? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 3): For private label sellers, very often the Amazon Seller Name (Store Name) will be same as your Brand Name. Private Label sellers do this for easier recognition. Imagine if other sellers join/hijack your listing, and the buyer is deciding who to buy from - if your brand name matc...

t: How to check a product on Amazon if it’s brand or not - Quora
s: Answer: Somewhere in the Amazon descriptions is a section that lists all the vital information about the product. If you don’t find the manufacturer named in the details, you know it is off-label. In this example, the manufacturer name (BOSE) is prominent in the title.
